mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_BOARD VALUES ( SEQ_TRADE_TRADE_NO.NEXTVAL, 2, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, default, #{price}, #{address}, default, default, default )
mapper.select: SELECT TRADE_NO, TITLE, PRICE, STORED_IMAGE_NAME, CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT A.TRADE_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, C.CATEGORY, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TRADE_NO ORDER BY B.IMAGE_NO) AS rn FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.TRADE_NO = B.TRADE_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE A.APPROVE='Y' ) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY TRADE_NO DESC

SELECT TRADE_NO, TITLE, PRICE, STORED_IMAGE_NAME, CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT A.TRADE_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME, C.CATEGORY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TRADE_NO ORDER BY B.IMAGE_NO) AS rn FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.TRADE_NO = B.TRADE_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND A.CATEGORY_CODE LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%' AND A.APPROVE = 'Y' ) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY TRADE_NO DESC

SELECT wl.TRADE_NO, TITLE, PRICE, CATEGORY, STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.TRADE_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, C.CATEGORY, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TRADE_NO ORDER BY B.IMAGE_NO) AS rn FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.TRADE_NO = B.TRADE_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE ) X JOIN WISH_LIST WL ON X.TRADE_NO = WL.TRADE_NO WHERE WL.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND X.rn = 1 ORDER BY X.TRADE_NO DESC
SELECT CATEGORY FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CODE=#{category}
SELECT A.*, B.ID FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN MEMBER B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE TRADE_NO=#{tradeNo} GROUP BY TRADE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_BOARD SET VISIT_COUNT = VISIT_COUNT+1 WHERE TRADE_NO=#{tradeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT TRADE_NO, TITLE, PRICE, STORED_IMAGE_NAME, CATEGORY FROM ( SELECT A.TRADE_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, C.CATEGORY, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TRADE_NO ORDER BY B.IMAGE_NO) AS rn FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.TRADE_NO = B.TRADE_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE A.APPROVE='N' ) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY TRADE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_BOARD SET APPROVE = 'Y' WHERE TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo}
UPDATE TRADE_BOARD SET APPROVE = 'R' WHERE TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WISH_LIST WHERE TRADE_NO=#{tradeNo} AND MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}

SELECT ADV_NO, TITLE, ADV_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_LINK, CONTENT, STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.ADV_NO, A.TITLE, A.ADV_NAME, A.COMPANY_NAME, A.COMPANY_LINK, A.CONTENT, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM ADVBOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.ADV_NO = B.ADV_NO ) ORDER BY ADV_NO

SELECT ADV_NO, TITLE, ADV_NAME, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_LINK, CONTENT, STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT A.ADV_NO, A.TITLE, A.ADV_NAME, A.COMPANY_NAME, A.COMPANY_LINK, A.CONTENT, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM ADVBOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.ADV_NO = B.ADV_NO WHERE A.ADV_NO=#{advNo} ) ORDER BY ADV_NO

SELECT TRADE_NO, TITLE, PRICE, STORED_IMAGE_NAME, CATEGORY, APPROVE FROM ( SELECT A.TRADE_NO, A.TITLE, A.PRICE, B.STORED_IMAGE_NAME, C.CATEGORY, A.APPROVE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.TRADE_NO ORDER BY B.IMAGE_NO) AS rn FROM TRADE_BOARD A JOIN UPLOAD_IMAGE B ON A.TRADE_NO = B.TRADE_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ) WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY TRADE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_BOARD SET TITLE =#{title}, CATEGORY_CODE=#{category}, CONTENT=#{content}, PRICE=#{price}, ADDRESS=#{address} WHERE TRADE_NO=#{tradeNo}
